EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Barbara, As a courtesy I just wanted to follow up with you on the email below. Are you still interested in learning about MBO Partners? Please let me know when you have a chance. Thank you and have a great day,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Monday, April 16, 2012 11:48 AM To: 'beverlybarham@bellsouth.net' Subject: MBO Partners Follow Up Dear Barbara, Some time ago you requested information regarding the services offered by MBO Partners. Now might not be the right time for you. Whatever your work life stage, I also hope you can join me in celebrating the news that independent work life in America has arrived. Our company is well into a year-long effort called The State of Independence in America. I encourage you to view some very interesting findings on the size and trends for independent work in our nation. Are you working on a contract/project now or are you currently working W2 at the moment? Regards, Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
